strategy.title: Farmer-First Strategy
strategy.intro: Diagnostics, commerce, and farm management flow together on top of a proprietary data engine and inclusive conversational interfaces.

bullets.text: Lightweight models (EdgePlantNet, MobileNet) deliver offline resilience on rural Android devices.
Start with public datasets, then amplify with farmer uploads, expert validation, and feedback loops.
Voice and text assistant taps Indic ASR/TTS (Bhashini) for dialect-aware support.
Transparent pricing, instant payments, and quality proofs shrink legacy middle layers.
Borrow DeHaat’s farmer stickiness while scaling asset-light like Agrim through partner logistics.
Built to dovetail with APMC reforms, e-NAM, APLM Act, and FPO collaborations.
Hyperlocal weather (Bharat Forecast System) and soil cards inform AI-led guidance.
Diagnostics → advisory → marketplace transactions → certification feed continuous learning.
Integrations with PM-KISAN, Soil Health Cards, and KCC build trust and accelerate onboarding.

methodology.title: Product Roadmap
methodology.intro: Our roadmap compounds value with every release.

phases.label: Phase I – Foundations
phases.description: Bootstrap datasets, benchmark EdgePlantNet/MobileNet, and ship MVP diagnostics.

phases.label: Phase II – Conversational Intelligence
phases.description: Launch multilingual copilot and onboard agronomy experts for validation loops.

phases.label: Phase III – Marketplace Launch
phases.description: Roll out B2B trading rails with FPO partnerships, digital QC, and compliant payouts.

phases.label: Phase IV – Precision Advisory
phases.description: Deploy hyperlocal weather, IoT signals, and AI advisories for automated interventions.

phases.label: Phase V – Certification & Finance
phases.description: Offer traceability, certification toolkits, and embedded finance for export readiness.

future.title: Future Scope
future.description: Upcoming enhancements include drone-based diagnostics, offline voice AI, and scaled government integrations.
